title: Amazon API Gateway HTTP API to AWS Step Functions Express Workflow
description: Create an API Gateway HTTP API endpoint that starts a Step Functions synchronous Express Workflow.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern explains how to deploy a CDK application with Amazon API Gateway that invokes a synchronous Step Functions workflow.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
